column4: I've been asking all day... can anyone please help me with my /boot partition?  It says unrecognized filesystem when I try and boot and when I try and install grub it says bus error
dying here... my live cd is failing every other reboot... someone?
I've been asking all day... can anyone please help me with my /boot partition?  It says unrecognized filesystem when I try and boot and when I try and install grub it says bus error
